title: Getting Hate

en: The next bout of feedback you receive is harsh and mean - almost visceral. The person is telling you there's no reason you should be alive and that your product is a piece of trash.
What the heck? How did this person make it into the project? And what are you supposed to do about it?

yes_caption: Delete the e-mail and move on

en: You delete the e-mail and try to move on, but some of the more specific jabs weigh on your mind.
Dominique quickly removes them from the project, informing you that they game from a "trollish" internet chat board. That explains that.
